TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NAReplaceTransform extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class NAReplaceTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: Create an output column of the same type and size of the input column, where missing values are replaced with either the default value or the mean/min/max value (for non-text columns only).
Docs.remarks: This transform can transform either scalars or vectors (both fixed and variable size), creating output columns that are identical to the input columns except for replacing NA values with either the default value, user input, or imputed values (min/max/mean are currently supported). Imputation modes are supported for vectors both by slot and across all slots.
